name: Mikha
greetingText: Do you know what day it is?
wishText: Happy Valentine’s Day, my love! ❤️ From the moment you came into my life, you’ve filled my heart with a love deeper than I ever imagined. Every smile, every touch, every moment with you is a treasure I hold close. You are my greatest adventure, my sweetest love, and my forever. I love you more than words can say, today and always. 💕
